remarks: The join of a co-atom (hyperplane) and an atom not under it is the lattice unit.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2012.)
statement:
lhpjat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpjat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpjat.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
lhpjat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpjat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpjat2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( P .\/ W ) = .1. ) $.
